byline.contributor: Susan Abad contributed reporting from Bogotá, Colombia, and Oliver Griffin from Medellín, Colombia.
byline.original: By NICHOLAS CASEY and EWAN MacKENNA

abstract: Leaked recording from pilot of plane that crashed while transporting  members of Brazilian soccer team Chapecoense to Colombia reveals he had asked to make emergency landing due to fuel emergency.
lead_paragraph: The pilot pleaded to make an immediate landing because of the situation, according to a recording leaked to Colombian news organizations.
snippet: The pilot pleaded to make an immediate landing because of the situation, according to a recording leaked to Colombian news organizations....

headline.main: Doomed Jet Carrying Brazilian Team Reportedly Ran Out of Fuel
headline.print_headline: Doomed Jet’s Pilot Said to Have Reported ‘Fuel Emergency’
